review: This is very good hotel with very nice room and everything is very clean and well maintained. The main benefit of this hotel is the great garden with terrace and grass, trees and flowers where you can sit in the shadow and relax.  Excellent.
name: Amos G

name: VibertParis

review: Our travel agent had told us this was the best place in town and looking at the website you would agree. Having planned to spend 4 nights at this guesthouse we ran away screaming however after 3, preferring a 10 hour drive to Kargil over another nights stay. On arrival it was immediately clear that they were doing construction works. The smell and the dust of cement were everywhere. Since we (me, my wife and the guide) were the only guests, they offered us what they called - their best room - and we could see them cleaning it with the vacuum cleaner. So, okay, we decided to give it a try, only to find out that there was dust everywhere - so much it made breathing in the room difficult. The glass in the windows is not properly mounted, so with the dry climate, the wind and the
name: Travelman-Tx
